name: Black Russian
ingredients: * 50ml (5 parts) Vodka * 20ml (2 parts) Coffee liqueur
prep: Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Cuba Libre
notes: garnish with a pineapple wedge and 3 cherries.
ingredients: *120 mL Cola *50 mL White rum *10 mL Fresh lime juice
prep: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Gin and tonic
ingredients: Gin and tonic water, according to taste
prep: In a glass filled with ice cubes, add gin and tonic.
garnish: A slice or wedge of lime

name: Manhattan
ingredients: *50ml rye or Canadian whisky *20ml Sweet red vermouth *Dash Angostura bitters *Maraschino cherry (Garnish)
prep: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served straight up.

name: Mojito
ingredients: *4 cl (4 parts) White rum * 3 cl (3 parts) Fresh lime juice * 6 leaves of Mint * 2 teaspoons Sugar * Soda Water
prep: Mint sprigs muddled with sugar and lime juice. Rum added and topped with soda water. Garnished with sprig of mint leaves. Served with a straw.
garnish: sprig of mint (Yerba buena in the original recipe)

name: Old Fashioned
ingredients: *4.5 cl Bourbon or Rye whiskey *2 dashes Angostura bitters *1 sugar cube *Few dashes plain water
prep: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved.  Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.  Garnish with orange slice, and a cocktail cherry.

name: Piña Colada
ingredients: *30 ml (one part) white rum *30 ml (one part) cream of coconut *90 ml (3 parts) pineapple juice
prep: Mix with crushed ice until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

name: Rob Roy
ingredients: *45ml Scotch whisky *25ml Sweet vermouth *Dash Angostura bitters
prep: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served straight up, or mixed in rocks glass, filled with ice.
served: straight up or on the rocks

name: Screwdriver
ingredients: *50 ml (1 part) vodka *100 ml (2 parts) orange juice
prep: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

name: Tom Collins
ingredients: *45ml (3 parts) Old Tom Gin *30ml (2 parts) freshly squeezed lemon juice *15ml (1 part) sugar syrup *60ml (4 parts) carbonated water to taste
prep: Mix the gin, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice, top up with soda water, garnish and serve.

name: Mickey Slim
notes: DDT is not very soluble in water so only a small quantity will dissolve. DDT has been linked to numerous health problems in humans.
ingredients: *One part gin *A pinch of DDT
prep: Stir the DDT into the gin and serve

name: Cocksucking Cowboy
ingredients: *one part cold Butterscotch Schnapps *two parts Baileys Irish Cream
prep: *Pour the butterscotch schnapps into the shot glass. *Carefully add the Bailey's. letting it float on top. *Serve.

name: Mai Tai
ingredients: *40ml (8 parts) white rum *20ml (4 parts) dark rum *15ml (3 parts) orange curaçao *15ml (3 parts) Orgeat syrup *10ml (2 parts) fresh lime juice
prep: Shake all ingredients except the dark rum together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass and float the dark rum onto the top. Garnish and serve with straw.

name: Margarita
ingredients: *35ml (7 parts) tequila *20ml (4 parts) Cointreau *15ml (3 parts) lime juice

name: Zombie
notes: Because of the high proof rum, this cocktail could be lit if desired.
ingredients: *1 part white rum *1 part golden rum *1 part dark rum *1 part apricot brandy *1 part pineapple juice *½ part 151-proof rum *1 part lime juice
prep: Mix ingredients other than the 151 in a shaker with ice. Pour into glass and top with the high-proof rum.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
ingredients: * 45ml (3 parts) Vodka * 15ml (1 part) Galliano * 90ml (6 parts) fresh orange juice
prep: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top. Garnish and serve.

name: Herbsaint Frappé
ingredients: *One part Herbsaint *One part soda water *Half teaspoon simple syrup or sugar
prep: Stir together with plenty of ice, then strain into a very well chilled glass. Serve very cold.

name: French 75
ingredients: *1 oz gin *1/2 oz. simple syrup (or 2 tsp. superfine sugar) *1/2 oz. lemon juice *Brut Champagne or other dry sparkling wine
prep: Combine gin, sugar, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into an iced champagne glass. Fill with Champagne. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Moscow Mule
notes: The proportion of ginger beer varies from 2 parts to 4 parts
ingredients: *Two parts vodka *One part lime juice * 3 parts ginger beer
prep: Mix ingredients together and serve

name: Horse's Neck
ingredients: * 40ml (1 part) Brandy * 110ml (~3 parts) Ginger ale * Dash of Angostura bitter (optional)
prep: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into old fashioned glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If required, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

name: Sazerac
notes: Originally, the Sazerac was made and served in an egg cup called a "''coquetier''"—a word speculated by some linguists to be the origin of the word "cocktail", though this myth has now been debunked. See below.
ingredients: *2 ounces Rye whiskey *Three dashes Peychaud's Bitters *One sugar cube or 1 tsp simple syrup *Splash of absinthe or Herbsaint
prep: One old fashioned or rocks glass is packed with ice and water to chill the glass. In a second old fashioned glass, muddle the sugar cube or simple syrup with the bitters. Add the rye to this mixture. Stir to combine. Empty the ice from the first glass. Pour the absinthe or Herbsaint into the glass and swirl to coat the sides of the glass. Any excess absinthe or Herbsaint is discarded. Pour the rye/sugar/bitters mixture into the coated glass. Twist a lemon peel over the glass and rub the rim of the glass with the peel. The peel can be discarded or placed into the cocktail.

name: Sidecar
ingredients: *Four parts brandy or cognac *Two parts Cointreau *One part lemon juice
prep: Mix the ingredients in a shaker half-full of ice. Strain and serve in a sugar-rimmed glass. Garnish with a strip of lemon rind

name: Brandy Alexander
ingredients: *30ml (1 part) Cognac *30ml (1 part) Crème de cacao (brown) *30ml (1 part) Fresh cream
prep: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

name: Martini
ingredients: *55ml (11 parts) gin *15ml (3 parts) dry vermouth
prep: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive. (On the rocks: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in old-fashioned glass, garnish as above and serve.)

name: Caipirinha
notes: A wide variety of fresh fruits can be used in place of lime. In the absence of cachaça, vodka can be used, making a caipiroska.
ingredients: * 50 ml (1⅔ fl oz) cachaça * ½ Lime cut into 4 wedges (or tahiti lime, but '''not''' green lemon) * 2 teaspoons crystal or refined sugar
prep: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with crushed ice and add the Cachaça.

name: Daiquirí
ingredients: *45ml (9 parts) White rum *20ml (4 parts) lime juice *5ml (1 part) Simple syrup
prep: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

name: Singapore Sling
ingredients: * 40ml (8 parts) Gin * 20ml (4 parts) Heering Cherry Liqueur (cherry brandy) * 5ml (1 part) Cointreau * 5ml (1 part) DOM Bénédictine * 10ml (2 parts) Grenadine * 80ml (16 parts) Pineapple juice * 30ml (6 parts) Fresh lemon juice * 1 dash Angostura bitters
prep: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into hurricane glass. Garnish with pineapple and maraschino cherry.

name: Pink Gin
notes: The traditional garnish is a shave of lemon rind. You can obtain this by removing about an inch strip of lemon rind with a potato peeler.
ingredients: *One part Plymouth gin *Dash of Angostura Bitters
prep: Chill the glass, then coat the inside with the Bitters. Add the gin very well chilled, garnish and serve.

name: Irish Coffee
ingredients: *40ml (2 parts) Irish whiskey *80ml (4 parts) hot coffee *30ml (1½ parts) fresh cream *1tsp brown sugar
prep: Heat the coffee, whiskey and sugar; do not boil. Pour into glass and top with cream; serve hot.

name: Cosmopolitan
notes: The drink should be a frothy bright pink colour
ingredients: * 40 ml Vodka Citron * 15 ml Cointreau * 15 ml Fresh lime juice * 30 ml Cranberry juice
prep: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

name: Punch
drinkware: Often served in a punch bowl with punch glasses.
ingredients: Usually fruit juices and other drink mixers, optionally with alcohol.
prep: Varies widely. Many prepared mixes are available.

name: Mint Julep
ingredients: * {{convert~3~USfloz}} Bourbon whiskey * 4 to 6 sprigs mint leaves * granulated sugar, to taste
prep: Put mint, sugar, and a small amount of bourbon into the bottom of a mixing glass. Gently muddle the mint and sugar, then let stand for a bit to allow the muddled leaves to release their flavor. Strain and pour into a julep cup (or similar vessel), rotating to coat the sides. Fill with ice, then add the rest of the bourbon whiskey. Garnish with a lightly slapped small mint sprig.

name: Salmiakki Koskenkorva
prep: Premixed cocktail

name: Negroni (cocktail)
ingredients: *30ml (1 part) gin *30ml (1 part) sweet red vermouth *30ml (1 part) campari
prep: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

name: Tequila Slammer
notes: If champagne is used instead of lemonade, the drink is known as a '''slammer Royale'''
ingredients: *One part tequila *One part 7 Up, ginger ale or Mountain Dew
prep: Mix carefully to avoid releasing the dissolved CO 2 .

name: Karsk (A.K.A Hot Caustic)
ingredients: *6cl (3 parts) Pure alcohol *6cl (3 parts) Hot coffee
prep: Heat the coffee; do not boil. Pour into cup and add the alcohol; serve hot.

name: Caesar
ingredients: *6 oz. Clamato Juice *1–1½ oz. Vodka *2 Dashes hot sauce *4 Dashes Worcestershire sauce *Celery salt *Freshly ground pepper *Lime wedge *1 Crisp celery stalk
prep: Rim glass with celery salt, and a Lime wedge.
garnish: stalk of celery and wedge of lime

name: Golden Cadillac
ingredients: *20ml (1 part) Galliano *20ml (1 part) Crème de cacao (white) *20ml (1 part) Cream
prep: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

name: Snakebite
ingredients: * One part beer * One part cider
prep: Mix in equal volumes in a standard pint glass.

name: The Vod-Bomb
ingredients: *6 oz. vodka *1 can Red Bull (AML)
prep: Either mix, with or without ice, or drop a shot of vodka into the Red Bull in the style of Depth charge
served: on the rocks, or straight up

name: Tom and Jerry
notes: Served hot in a mug or bowl
ingredients: eggs or egg whites, sugar, brandy or rum
prep: Mix egg and milk with rum

name: Sake Bomb
ingredients: * 1 pint (~14 parts) beer * 1 shot (1 part) Sake
prep: The shot of sake is dropped into the beer, causing it to fizz violently. The drink should then be consumed immediately.

name: Kalimotxo
ingredients: * One part red wine * One part cola or another carbonated soft drink
prep: Stir together over plenty of ice.

name: Kir
notes: A recipe can be found at the International Bartenders Association website.
ingredients: *90ml (3 ounces) (9 parts) white wine *10ml (0.33 ounce) (1 part) crème de cassis
prep: *Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.

name: Flaming Doctor Pepper
ingredients: *1 pint (~13 parts) beer *3 parts Amaretto *1 part high-proof liquor
prep: Layer the two spirits in the shot glass, with the high-proof liquor on top. Light the shot and allow it to burn; then extinguish it by dropping it into the beer glass. Drink immediately.

name: Stinger
ingredients: *3 parts brandy *1 part white crème de menthe
prep: Mix in a cocktail shaker and strain into a cocktail glass. May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.

name: Pisco Sour
ingredients: * 2 fl oz (8 parts) Pisco * 1 fl oz (4 parts) Key lime or lemon juice * 3/4 fl oz (3 part) Simple syrup * 1 Egg white{{ref label~Peruvian-note~a~}}
prep: Shake hard or blend with ice and strain into glass. The bitters are an aromatic garnish topping the finished drink, put on top of Pisco Sour foam.

name: Zurracapote
ingredients: * red wine * fruit (peaches, lemons) * sugar * cinnamon

name: Sours
notes: See the article for specifics.

name: Appletini (aka Apple Martini)
ingredients: *40ml (3 parts) Vodka *15ml (1 part) Apple schnapps / Calvados *15ml (1 part) Cointreau
prep: Mix in a shaker, then pour into a chilled glass. Garnish and serve.

name: Buck's Fizz
ingredients: * 100ml (2 parts) orange juice * 50ml (1 part) champagne
prep: * Pour the orange juice into glass and top up champagne. Stir gently, garnish and serve.

name: Bumboo
ingredients: *2 ounces rum *1 ounce water *2 sugar cubes *Sprinkle 1/4 teaspoon to taste cinnamon *Sprinkle 1/4 teaspoon to taste nutmeg
prep: Mix and garnish.

name: Vodka tonic
ingredients: *One part vodka *One to three parts tonic water, to taste
prep: Mix and serve-stirred, not shaken.
garnish: citrus fruit, usually lime or lemon

name: Morir Soñando
ingredients: * 2 cups orange juice * 1/2 cup of sugar * 4 cups of evaporated milk * 2½ cup of crushed ice
prep: Mix sugar and milk and stir until all the sugar has dissolved. Refrigerate until very cold. Add the ice to the milk and stir. Slowly pour the orange juice in the milk, stirring constantly. Serve immediately.

name: Tamagozake
notes: An alternative preparation method is to heat the sake/egg/honey mixture together, while whisking occasionally.  Be careful to stop cooking before it turns into scrambled eggs.
ingredients: *One raw egg (or egg yolk only) *3/4 cup (200 cc) sake *Honey or sugar to taste
prep: Whisk the raw egg yolk and honey/sugar into 3/4 cup hot sake (hot enough to lightly cook the egg - 1:30 in the microwave).

name: Brass Monkey
ingredients: *One part dark rum *One part vodka *One part orange juice
prep: Stir together and serve over ice.

name: Coquito
ingredients: *28 oz Coconut milk *2 cups Rum *14 ounces Condensed milk *vanilla, to taste
prep: Place ingredients into blender, blend until well mixed. Pour into a bottle and refrigerate until cold. Serve in small glasses and sprinkle top lightly with nutmeg.

name: Tequila Sunrise
ingredients: * 45ml (3 parts) Tequila * 90ml (6 parts) Orange juice * 15ml (1 part) Grenadine syrup
prep: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish and serve.

name: Gimlet
ingredients: * Four parts gin * One part sweetened lime juice
prep: Mix and serve. Garnish with a slice of lime

name: Hurricane
ingredients: *One part dark rum *One part white rum *Half part over proofed rum *passion fruit syrup *lime juice
prep: Shake ingredients with ice, then pour into the glass and serve over ice.
served: on the rocks, poured over ice

name: Michelada
ingredients: Mix the beer with tomato juice, freshly squeezed lime juice, and Worcestershire sauce, teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, or hot sauce.

name: Alabama Slammer
ingredients: *3/4 oz. Amaretto *3/4 oz. Southern Comfort *3/4 oz. Sloe Gin *fill with orange juice

name: Baby Guinness
notes: Variation substitutes black Sambuca for coffee liqueur
ingredients: 3/4 shot (3 parts) Coffee liqueur, 1/4 shot (1 part) Irish cream
prep: Float Irish cream on top of coffee liqueur

name: Tinto de verano
ingredients: *One part red wine *One part gaseosa (or a mixture of Sprite and water or Fanta)
prep: Mix and serve well chilled.

name: Rickey
ingredients: *2oz bourbon, rye whiskey, or gin *Half of a lime squeezed and dropped in the glass *Sparkling Mineral Water
prep: Combine spirit, lime and shell in a highball or wine glass. Add ice, stir and then add sparkling mineral water.

name: Yorsh
ingredients: *10 part beer * 1 part vodka (Ratio varies to taste)
prep: Mix thoroughly and drink quickly!

name: Carrot Cake
ingredients: * one part Baileys Irish Cream * one part Hot Damn Cinnamon Schnapps * one part Frangelico

name: Irish Car Bomb
notes: Original recipe: * 1/2 oz. Irish cream * 1/2 pint Irish stout * 1/4 oz. Irish whiskey * 1/4 oz. coffee liqueur
ingredients: * 1/2 shot Irish whiskey * 1/2 shot Irish cream * 1/2 pint Irish stout
prep: The whiskey is floated on top of the Irish cream in a shot glass, and the shot glass is then dropped into the stout.

name: Bellini
notes: Traditionally a Bellini uses Prosecco for the wine and white peaches for the fruit.
ingredients: * 100ml (2 parts) dry sparkling wine * 50ml (1 part) fresh peach purée
prep: Pour peach puree into chilled flute, add gently sparkling wine. Stir gently.

name: Lynchburg Lemonade
ingredients: Jack Daniel's, triple sec, sour mix, lemon-lime
prep: Shake and Strain

name: Rusty Nail
ingredients: *45ml (9 parts) Scotch Whisky *25ml (5 parts) Drambuie
prep: First fill a 16 oz glass with crushed ice until it is overflowing. Pour in 5 parts drambuie and 9 parts scotch. Stir gently, as to not bruise the ice. Keep stirring until a thick frost develops on the side of the glass. Garnish with a lemon twist. Serve.

name: Grasshopper
ingredients: *30 ml (1 part) Crème de menthe (green) *30 ml (1 part) Crème de cacao (white) *30 ml (1 part) Fresh cream
prep: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Monkey Gland
ingredients: * 1 part gin * 1 part orange juice * dash absinthe * dash grenadine
prep: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Cerveza Preparada
ingredients: * Tomato juice * Mexican beer

name: Colombia
ingredients: *2 parts vodka * 1 part blue Curaçao * 1 part grenadine * 1 part lemon juice * 6 parts orange juice
prep: Shake the vodka and citrus juices in a mixer, then strain into the glass. Slide the grenadine down one side of the glass, where it will sink to the bottom. Slide the curacao down the other side, to lie between the vodka and grenadine, and serve before the layers have a chance to mix.

name: The Blenheim
ingredients: * 3 parts Brandy * 2 parts Yellow Chartreuse * 1 part Lillet * 1 part Orange Juice * 1 part Dubonnet
prep: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Bronx
ingredients: * 30ml (6 parts) Gin * 15ml (3 parts) Sweet Red Vermouth * 10ml (2 parts) Dry Vermouth * 15ml (3 parts) Orange juice
prep: Pour into cocktail shaker all ingredients with ice cubes, shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail or martini glass.

name: Jack Rose
ingredients: *2 parts applejack *1 part lemon or lime juice *1/2 part grenadine
prep: Traditionally shaken into a chilled glass, garnished, and served straight up.

name: London Fog
ingredients: *7 parts gin * 2 parts pernod

name: El Presidente
ingredients: *Two parts rum *One part curaçao *One part dry vermouth *Dash grenadine
prep: stir well with ice, then strain into glass. Garnish and serve.

name: Salty dog
ingredients: *40ml gin *100ml grapefruit juice
prep: Shake vodka and grapefruit juice in cocktail shaker. Strain into a salt-rimmed highball glass.

name: Backdraft
notes: The cinnamon can be replaced with black pepper if desired, creating a much more bitter drink, known as the '''pepperdraft'''
ingredients: * Grand Marnier * Drambuie * Cinnamon * Ice
prep: The preparation of this drink is complex, and is explained below.

name: Vesper
ingredients: *Three measures 90-proof gin * One measure 100-proof Polish vodka * One-half measure Kina Lillet or Cocchi Americano
prep: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet and garnish with a thin slice of lemon peel.

name: Americano
ingredients: *30ml Campari *30ml red vermouth *A splash of soda water
prep: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.

name: Incredible Hulk
ingredients: *One part hpnotiq * One part cognac
prep: Stir together and serve over ice.

name: Four Horsemen
ingredients: * 1 part Bourbon whiskey (Jim Beam) * 1 part Tennessee whiskey (Jack Daniel's) * 1 part Scotch whisky (Johnnie Walker Black) * 1 part Irish Whiskey (Jameson)
prep: Mix the four spirits together into the shot glass, and down immediately.

name: B-52
ingredients: *20ml (1 part) coffee liqueur (Kahlúa) *20ml (1 part) Irish Cream (Baileys Irish Cream) *20ml (1 part) Orange Cognac (Grand Marnier)
prep: Layer ingredients into a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

name: The Godfather
ingredients: *35 ml (2 parts) scotch whisky *35 ml (2 parts) amaretto
prep: pour into an old fashioned glass

name: French Connection
ingredients: *3.5cl (1 part) Cognac *3.5cl (1 part) Disaronno liqueur
prep: Pour ingredients into a Snifter with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Kir Royal
notes: A recipe can be found at the International Bartenders Association website.
ingredients: *90ml (3 ounces) (9 parts) champagne *10ml (0.33 ounce) (1 part) crème de cassis
prep: *Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up champagne.

name: Gibson
ingredients: *60ml (2 ounces) (6 parts) gin *10ml (0.33 ounce) (1 part) dry vermouth
prep: *Stir well in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish and serve

name: Whiskey sour
notes: Garnish with maraschino cherry and orange slice.
ingredients: * 45ml (3 parts) Bourbon whiskey * 30ml (2 parts) fresh lemon juice * 15ml (1 part) Gomme syrup * dash egg white (optional)
prep: Shake with ice. Strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass to serve "on the rocks."

name: Bombardino
ingredients: * 1 part Brandy * 1 part Advocaat (or eggnog)

name: Nikolaschka
notes: One should eat the lemon with the coffee and sugar mixture and then enjoy the drink.
ingredients: * Cognac * Coffee powder * Powdered sugar * Lemon disk, peeled
prep: Pour cognac into brandy snifter, place lemon disk across the top of the glass and top with sugar and coffee.

name: Bijou Cocktail
ingredients: * 3 parts gin *1 part green Chartreuse *1 part sweet vermouth *Dash orange bitters
prep: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain

name: Golden Elk
ingredients: *2 parts Jägermeister * 1 part Goldschläger

name: Jack and Coke
ingredients: *1 part Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey *3 parts Coca-Cola *Ice
prep: Pour Jack Daniel's into Collins glass filled with ice. Fill to desired level with Coca-Cola. Stir lightly.

name: Brandy Daisy
ingredients: *1½ ounces brandy or Cognac *¾ ounce yellow Chartreuse *¾ ounce lemon juice
prep: Stir well with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker, then strain into a chilled Collins glass and top with a splash of chilled club soda or seltzer.

name: Planter's Punch
ingredients: *6cl (6 parts) dark rum *3cl (3 parts) fresh lemon juice *1cl (one part) grenadine syrup *Soda water as necessary
prep: Mix in shaker with ice. Pour into glass and top up with soda water. Garnish and serve.

name: Caipirinha
notes: A wide variety of fresh fruits can be used in place of lime. In the absence of cachaça, vodka can be used, making a caipiroska.
ingredients: * 50 ml (1⅔ fl oz) cachaça * ½ Lime cut into 4 wedges (or tahiti lime, but '''not''' green lemon) * 2 teaspoons crystal or refined sugar
prep: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with crushed ice and add the Cachaça.

name: B and B
ingredients: * 1 part cognac * 1 part Bénédictine
prep: Combine and stir.
wiki_page: List of duo and trio cocktails

name: Screwdriver
ingredients: *50 ml (1 part) vodka *100 ml (2 parts) orange juice
prep: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

name: Bacardi cocktail
ingredients: *45ml (9 parts) Bacardi white rum *20ml (4 parts) lemon or lime juice *5ml (1 part) grenadine syrup
prep: Shake together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass and serve

name: Paradise
ingredients: *35ml (7 parts) gin *20ml (4 parts) apricot brandy *15ml (3 parts) orange juice
prep: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

name: Rose
ingredients: *45ml (9 parts) dry vermouth *15ml (3 parts) Kirsch *10ml (2 parts) cherry brandy
prep: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass. Garnish and serve.

name: Golden Dream
notes: Should be quite fluffy
ingredients: *20ml (2 parts) Galliano * 20ml (2 parts) Cointreau * 20ml (2 parts) Fresh orange juice * 10ml (1 part) Fresh cream
prep: Shake together in a mixer with cracked ice. Strain into glass and serve.
garnish: wedge of orange and a cocktail umbrella

name: Japanese Slipper
ingredients: *30 ml (1 part) Midori *30 ml (1 part) cointreau *30 ml (1 part) lemon juice
prep: Shake together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

name: Kamikaze
ingredients: *30ml (1 part) vodka *30ml (1 part) triple sec *30ml (1 part) lime juice
prep: Shake all ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

name: Orgasm
ingredients: *30ml Cointreau *30ml Baileys Irish Cream *20ml Grand Marnier
prep: Build all ingredients over ice in an old fashioned glass or shot glass. Garnish with cherry.

name: Porto Flip
ingredients: *15ml (3 parts) brandy *40ml (8 parts) port *10ml (2 parts) egg yolk
prep: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve

name: Pegu Club
ingredients: *1 1/2 ounces gin *3/4 ounce orange cointreau *1 teaspoon lime juice *Dash bitters *Dash orange bitters
prep: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with crushed ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

name: Champagne cocktail
ingredients: *1 sugar cube *2-3 dashes Angostura bitters *30ml Brandy *Champagne
prep: Place the sugar cube at the bottom of the flute and add Angostura bitters until it dissolves. Add the brandy, then fill with the champagne. Garnish with the orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: Staten Island Ferry
ingredients: *One part Malibu Rum *One part pineapple juice
prep: Stir together and serve over ice.

name: Macuá
ingredients: *2 parts white rum (preferably Flor de Caña) * 2 parts guava juice * 1 part lemon juice * sugar to taste
prep: Blend the ingredients with 1 cup of ice and serve well chilled. Garnish with an orange slice

name: Alexander
ingredients: *1 oz gin *1 oz white crème de cacao *1 oz light cream
prep: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.
served: blended (no ice), then on the rocks

name: Dark 'N Stormy
notes: Lime optional.
ingredients: *50 mL of Gosling's Black Seal rum *150 mL Ginger beer *1:3 ratio *1 slice of lime
prep: Pour the ginger beer into a glass over ice. Top off with black rum. Squeeze in the lime wedge and drop it in.

name: Blue Lagoon
ingredients: *1 part Vodka *1 part Blue Curacao *4 parts Lemonade
prep: pour vodka and blue curacao in a shaker with ice, shake well & strain into ice filled highball glass, top with lemonade, garnish and serve.

name: Spritz
ingredients: *3cl (one part) Prosecco *3cl (one part) bitters (Campari, Aperol, Cynar, Gran Classico ''etc.'') *3cl (one part) carbonated water
prep: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

name: Sex on the Beach
ingredients: * 2 parts (40ml) Vodka * 1 parts (20ml) Peach schnapps * 2 parts (40ml) Orange juice * 2 parts (40ml) Cranberry juice
prep: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Pink Lady
ingredients: *1.5 oz. gin *4 dashes grenadine *1 egg white
prep: Shake ingredients very well with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Orange Whip
ingredients: *4oz (four parts) orange juice *1oz (one part) rum *1oz (one part) vodka *2oz (two parts) cream
prep: Blend briefly with hand blender. Pour ingredients over ice and stir.
served: blended (no ice), then on the rocks

name: Redheaded slut
notes: may also be served as a shooter -- chilled and shaken, without ice
ingredients: *5 cl (one part) Jägermeister *5 cl (one part) peach schnapps *cranberry juice
prep: Combine Jägermeister and schnapps in glass full of ice. Add cranberry juice to fill to top. Stir as necessary.

name: Gin Bucket
ingredients: *One or Two handles Gin *4 l Fresca, Sprite or 7-up *Fresh squeezed citrus fruit
prep: Mix all in bucket, add ice

name: Cheeky Vimto
ingredients: * 275ml blue WKD * 50ml port

name: Blue Hawaii
notes: For best results do not use bottled Sweet and Sour mix, but rather make your own at the bar with fresh citrus juice and simple syrup. This advice applies to any drink that calls for Sweet and Sour.
ingredients: * 3/4 ounce light rum * 3/4 ounce vodka * 1/2 ounce Curaçao * 3 ounces pineapple juice, unsweetened * 1 ounce Sweet and Sour
prep: Combine all ingredients with ice, stir or shake, then pour into a hurricane glass with the ice. For garnish score pineapple or orange slice with a knife and inert onto rim of glass; optionally use toothpick or cocktail umbrella to spear maraschino cherry through center and attach to top of fruit slice; otherwise float cherry on top of ice.
garnish: pineapple or orange quarter slice, maraschino cherry

name: Harrogate Nights
ingredients: 2.5cl (1 part) Vodka 1.25cl (1/2 part) Archers (Peach Schnapps) 1.25cl (1/2 part) Malibu 2.5cl (1 part) Fresh Orange Juice 2.5cl (1 part) Fresh Pineapple Juice dash of Fresh Cranberry Juice
prep: Fill a Highball glass with ice then add a dash of cranberry juice. Add the rest of the ingredients to the Boston glass, shake and strain into the Highball glass. Garnish and serve.

name: Fizzy Apple Cocktail
ingredients: *1 shot Apple Vodka *1/2 cup Apple Juice *1/2 cup Lemonade
prep: Combine all three ingredients into a chilled glass and serve with ice and garnish.

name: Brandy Sour
ingredients: *5 cl (two parts) Cyprus brandy *2.5 cl (one part) lemon squash *2-4 drops of bitters *Top with carbonated water
prep: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

name: Sea breeze
ingredients: *40 ml Vodka *120 ml Cranberry juice *30 ml Grapefruit juice
prep: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Sin slammer
ingredients: soda water, gomme syrup

name: Seven and Seven
ingredients: *1 shot Seagram's Seven Crown whiskey *6 fl. oz. 7 Up *Ice
prep: Pour whiskey into Collins glass filled with ice. Fill to desired level with 7 Up. Stir lightly.

name: Lemon, Lime & Bitters
ingredients: *Lemonade *Lime juice cordial (aka sweetened lime juice) *Bitters
prep: Rim the inside of the glass with 4 to 5 dashes of bitters then pour lemonade and lime juice (15-30 mL) into glass. Garnish if desired.

name: Slippery Nipple
ingredients: *(1 part) Sambuca * (1 part) Baileys Irish Cream
prep: Pour the Sambuca into a shot glass, then pour the Baileys on top so that the two liquids do not mix.

name: Chimayó Cocktail
ingredients: * 1½ oz Tequila * 1 oz apple cider * 1/4 oz lemon juice * 1/4 oz creme de cassis
prep: Pour the tequila and unfiltered apple cider into glass over ice. Add the lemon juice and creme de cassis and stir. Garnish and serve.

name: Cape Cod
ingredients: * Vodka * Cranberry juice
prep: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Flaming Volcano
notes: This is a multi-user group drink that should be served with very long (15-20") colored straws!
ingredients: * 1 ounce light rum * {{convert~1~USoz~ml~-1}} brandy * {{convert~1~USoz~ml~-1}} overproof rum (e.g., Bacardi 151) * {{convert~4~USoz~ml~-1}} orange juice * {{convert~2~USoz~ml~-1}} lemon juice, unsweetened * {{convert~2~USoz~ml~-1}} almond flavored syrup
prep: Combine all ingredients with 2 scoops of crushed ice in a blender, blend briefly, then pour into the "volcano bowl". Pour some rum into the central crater of the volcano bowl and light it. For garnish score pineapple or orange slices with a knife and insert onto rim of bowl; optionally add maraschino cherries to the main drink. Multiply recipe to adjust to the size of the container (e.g. x2 for a {{convert~32~USoz~ml~adj=on}} volcano bowl).
garnish: pineapple and/or orange quarter slices, maraschino cherries

name: Ginza Mary
notes: add freshly ground Black Pepper to taste.
ingredients: * 2 Oz. (4 parts) Vodka * 1 {{frac~1~2}} Oz. (3 parts) Sake * 2 Oz. (4 parts) Tomato Juice * {{frac~1~2}} Oz. (1 part) Lemon Juice * 3-5 Dashes Tabasco Sauce * 2 Dashes Soy Sauce
prep: Combine ingredients and cracked ice, mix, pour into chilled Old Fashioned Glass

name: Osaka Dry
notes: Garnish with pickled plum.
ingredients: * 6 parts Vodka * 1 part Sake * Pickled Plum
prep: Combine ingredients (except plum) and cracked ice in cocktail shaker, strain, pour into chilled Cocktail Glass.

name: Golden Russian
ingredients: * Vodka * Galliano * lime juice
prep: Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Bananarita
notes: Rubbing the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it.
ingredients: *For a 12oz. Highball glass *6oz. of ice *Tequila *1.5-2oz. 99 Bananas liquor *3-4oz. Margarita mix (lime flavor preferred)
prep: Fill the glass halfway (6oz.) with ice. Pour the tequila to the rim of the ice. Add the 99 Bananas liquor as well as the margarita mix; finish by adding the garnishes.

name: Planter's Punch
ingredients: * 4.5cl Dark rum * 3.5cl Fresh orange juice * 3.5cl Fresh pineapple juice * 2cl Fresh lemon juice * 1cl Grenadine syrup * 1cl Sugar syrup * 3 or 4 dashes Angostura bitters
prep: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

name: Bermuda Rum Swizzle
ingredients: *4oz. Gosling's Black Seal Rum *4oz. Gosling's Barbados Rum *Juice of 2 lemons *5oz. pineapple juice *5oz orange juice *2oz. Bermuda falernum *6 dashes Angostura Bitters
prep: Mix in pitcher with crushed ice, shake vigorously until a frothing head appears. Strain into cocktail glasses. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry. Serves 6.

name: Cojito
ingredients: *15ml of white rum *5ml Malibu *5ml lime juice *Mint leaves *1 sprig of mint
prep: In a shaker add white rum, Malibu, lime juice, some mint leaves and crushed ice, garnish with the sprig of mint.
served: straight up in a cocktail glass

name: Old Etonian
ingredients: *1.5 oz. gin *1.5 oz. Kina Lillet or Cocchi Americano *2 dashes Orange bitters *2 dashes Crème de Noyaux
prep: Shake with ice and strain into a stemmed cocktail glass.

name: Matador
notes: Sour mix may be used in place of lime juice, depending on preference and availability. Champagne flutes are also commonly used for serving.
ingredients: *1 to 1.5 parts silver or blanco tequila *2 to 3 parts pineapple juice *Juice of half a lime
prep: Mix the ingredients in a shaker half full of ice. Strain and serve in a chilled cocktail glass or champagne flute.

name: Sweet Melissa
ingredients: Gin and tonic water, splash of Jack Daniel's to taste
prep: In a glass filled with ice, add gin and fill with tonic. Add splash of Jack. Lime wedge optional

name: Woo Woo
ingredients: * 2 parts (1 oz) Vodka * 1 part (.5 oz) Peach Schnapps * 4 parts (2 oz) Cranberry juice
prep: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Bloody Mary
ingredients: *45ml (3 parts) Vodka * 90ml (6 parts) Tomato juice * 15ml (1 part) Lemon juice
prep: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk and lemon wedge (optional).
garnish: Celery stalk or dill pickle spear

name: Stengah
ingredients: Whisky, Soda Water, Ice.
prep: Build over ice; stir.

name: Corn N' Oil
ingredients: *60mL of (Cruzan) blackstrap rum *10mL of Falernum
prep: Pour the rum and falernum into a glass over ice and stir well. Squeeze in the lime wedge(s) and drop it in.

name: Quick Fuck
ingredients: *one part Midori liqueur *one part Kahlua *one part Baileys Irish Cream
prep: *Pour Midori into shot glass. *Carefully add Baileys, letting it float on top.

name: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: one-half shot of vodka, one-half shot of Frangelico
prep: Stir the liquors in a shot glass. Consume the shot, then bite and suck on the lemon wedge.
garnish: lemon wedge sprinkled with white/ brown sugar

name: The Last Word
ingredients: * One part gin * One part lime juice * One part green Chartreuse * One part maraschino liqueur
prep: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mitch Morgan
ingredients: *5cl Bourbon *strip of bacon (garnish)

name: Bacon Martini
ingredients: *5cl bacon vodka *strip of bacon, olive (garnish)

name: Aviation
ingredients: * 60ml (2 oz.) gin * 15ml (1/2 oz.) lemon juice * 15ml (1/2 oz.) maraschino liqueur * 7.5ml (1/4 oz.) crème de violette
prep: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Govana Libre
ingredients: * 2 parts Dark Rum * 1 parts Lime Juice * 1 part Lemonade * 1 part Sugar Cane Syrup * 1 part Grenadine
prep: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass over crushed ice, top with lemonade, grenadine and a lime garnish.

name: Blow Job
ingredients: * 1/2 oz. Bailey's *1/2 oz. Kahlúa * whipped cream top
prep: Pour 1/2 oz Bailey's and 1/2 oz Kahlúa in shot glass and top with whipped cream. Serve.

name: Chicago Cocktail
ingredients: *Brandy * Triple sec * Bitters * Champagne (optional)
prep: Shake or stir with ice.

name: Bloodhound
ingredients: * 2 parts gin * 1 part dry vermouth * 1 part sweet vermouth *strawberry coulis/crushed strawberries
prep: Shake alcoholic ingredients and serve over crushed ice with strawberry coulis and strawberries garnish

name: Tschunk
ingredients: *4-6 cl golden rum or dark rum *limes *Club-Mate *(if desired): brown sugar *ice
prep: Dice limes, put them together with the brown sugar into a high glass and crush both. Add crushed ice and pour the rum and the mate over it. Add a straw

name: Clover Club Cocktail
ingredients: *1½ Oz. Gin *3/4 Oz. Lemon Juice *1/4 Oz. Raspberry Syrup (or Grenadine) *1 Egg White
prep: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.

name: Paloma
ingredients: * One part tequila * Three parts grapefruit soda
prep: Stir together and serve over ice.

name: Bourbon Triple Sour
ingredients: bourbon whiskey, triple sec, sour mix, sugar syrup

name: Springbokkie
ingredients: * 1cl (1 part) Amarula * 3cl (3 parts) Creme de Menthe
prep: The Creme de Menthe is poured into the shot glass and the Amarula is carefully layered on top.

name: Mate con malicia
ingredients: * 70-80 °C hot water * Grape aguardiente * Yerba mate

name: Agent Orange
ingredients: *5 cl (1 part) vodka *15 cl (3 parts) carrot juice
prep: Mix in an old fashioned glass with ice and serve.

name: Rose Bennie
ingredients: * 4.5 cl (3 parts) Vodka * 3.0 cl (2 parts) fresh lemonade * 1.5 cl (1 part) cranberry juice
prep: Shake with ice. Strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass to serve "on the rocks."

name: Mimosa
ingredients: One part champagne, one part orange juice
prep: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.

name: Milky Pete
ingredients: *5 cl (1 part) vodka *10 cl (2 parts) skimmed milk
prep: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

name: Raymond Massey
ingredients: *2 oz Canadian rye whisky *½ oz Ginger syrup *5 oz Champagne
prep: Shake whisky and syrup over ice. Strain into highball and top with champagne. Garnish with lemon peel.

name: Blood and Sand
notes: A variant is to combine all ingredients in a collins glass, add another splash of orange juice then flame the zest over it.
ingredients: * 1 oz blended scotch * 1 oz blood orange juice * ¾ oz sweet vermouth * ¾ oz Cherry Heering
prep: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into Cocktail glass. Flame orange zest over the top of the glass.

name: Farnell
ingredients: *1 part Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey *3 parts lemonade *Ice * 1 slice of lime * 1 sprig of fresh mint
prep: Pour Jack Daniel's into Collins glass filled with ice. Fill to desired level with lemonade. Stir lightly and garnish with lime and mint.

name: Skittle Bomb - Rétreau
ingredients: * 1 shot Cointreau * 1/2 can Red Bull
prep: The Cointreau is poured into a shot glass, and the shot glass is then dropped into the Red Bull.

name: Bourbon lancer
ingredients: *9 parts Bourbon *16 parts Champagne *3 dashes Angostura bitters
prep: Build over ice; stir. Garnish with twist of lemon peel.

name: BLT
ingredients: Bacon  Lettuce or Liquor  Tomato  Vodka or Bacon vodka

name: Seifu
ingredients: * 1 part Vodka * 1 part Club soda * Splash of Grapefruit juice
prep: TBC

name: Corpse Reviver
ingredients: * 2 parts cognac * 1 part apple brandy or Calvados * 1 part sweet vermouth
prep: Stir with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Juliana
ingredients: * (4 parts) Golden Cachaça * (3 parts) fresh Cashew juice * (1 part) Cointreau
prep: Shake together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass and serve immediately.

name: Amber Moon
notes: This cocktail may also be blended
ingredients: * {{convert~3~USfloz}} whiskey or vodka * 1 raw egg * Tabasco sauce, to taste
prep: Crack an egg into a tall glass, leaving the yolk unbroken. Pour in whiskey. Add Tabasco to taste, or serve on the side.

name: Old Pal
ingredients: *One part Rye whiskey *One part dry Vermouth *One part Campari
prep: Mix the 3 ingredients in a mixing glass, and add ice. Stir to chill, and strain into a cocktail glass

name: Rüdesheimer Kaffee
ingredients: * 125 cl hot, black coffee * 3 cubes of sugar * 4 cl Asbach Uralt brandy, or cognac, or armagnac * Whipped cream sweetened with vanilla sugar * Dark chocolate shavings for sprinkling
prep: Flambée brandy and sugar in Rüdesheimer cup to dissolve sugar. Add hot coffee and top with whipped cream; garnish.

name: Bushwacker
notes: The Bushwacker is often made using many other types of liquors and spirits as there are dozens of variations on this cocktail, some of which include the addition of Bacardi Rum, Vodka, Amaretto, and Baileys Irish Cream, as well as using nutmeg as a garnish.
ingredients: *1 ounce  Dark Rum *1 ounce Kahlúa *1 ounce  Dark Crème de Cacao *2 ounces  Cream of Coconut *2 ounces Milk *1 cup ice
prep: Blend all the ingredients together in a blender, including the ice, and then strain into a hurrican glass. Place cherry on top of the drink as a garnish and serve. Whipped cream can also be added as a garnish to the top of the drink before the cherry.

name: Boulevardier (cocktail)
ingredients: *30ml (1 part) rye whisky *30ml (1 part) sweet red vermouth *30ml (1 part) campari
prep: Stir with ice, strain, garnish and serve.

name: Licorice stick
notes: Garnish with a piece of black licorice.
ingredients: *120 mL Cola *50 mL Anisette or *50 mL Absinthe
prep: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with a piece of black licorice.

name: Brown Bomber
ingredients: *1/2 oz peanut liqueur *1/2 oz white creme de cacao *2 oz light cream
prep: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
